OCD.name: DbDataRecordView
OCD.description: DbDataRecordView provides filtering and aggregation for DataRecords produced by the DataEmitters.

AD.name: emitter.id
AD.description: ID for the events emitted by this emitter.

AD.name: data.emitters
AD.description: Coma-separated list of DataEmitter's IDs this DbDataRecordView will subscribe to

AD.name: sql.view
AD.default: SELECT AVG(TEMP) AS AVG_TEMP FROM (SELECT TEMPERATUREINTERNAL AS TEMP FROM DR_HEATER ORDER BY TIMESTAMP DESC LIMIT 10);
AD.description: SQL to be executed to build a view.

AD.name: refresh.rate
AD.description: SQL view refresh rate in seconds.
